Text: Thank you! I'm gonna make my English Portfolio about this movie.

the only thing gay about this movie is the gay music at the end of the credits. when I see 'nigger' I expect the next word to be 'rap'. i know i'll just make up some rap lyrics and we'll call this the unofficial end song.

This shit is as irritating and unfunny as the fucking LISP! A race of fags wiping out ALL females so they can't procreate and cease to be: Now that's just NIGGER IGNORANCE!

At first I thought this post was a spoof but found it on IMDb. It has a 5.9/10 rating there, so this can't be too big of a Turkey!

Curiosity kills the cat - gonna check it & give my own feedback. However, I hate rap, and if that's all there is then I wont bother.

Well, I'm back.  During the hour or so it took to D/L this I was drinking a lot of beer, thinking that would help soften up my own review.

Having read comments here and on IMDb, the best review is the one from the poster MAFFIA. I completely agree with everything. 

The humor would best be described as juvenile. That is sad, because this short movie had potential if only it had a decent plot. I can't say this is not worth d/l because everyone should come to their own conclusion.

But I feel the IMDb gave it too high of a rating. And since I consider myself an enemy combatant of censorship, I will continue to seed this until the ratio 1.5 or 2.0. Then I will definitely delete this torrent. Good luck!
